price: Mwenyezi Mungu amewaahidi wanaafiki wanaume na wanaafiki wanawake na makafiri Moto wa Jahannamu kudumu humo. Hayo yanawatosha, na Mwenyezi Mungu amewalaani; nao wana adhabu milele.
arabic: وَعَدَ ٱللَّهُ ٱلۡمُنَٰفِقِينَ وَٱلۡمُنَٰفِقَٰتِ وَٱلۡكُفَّارَ نَارَ جَهَنَّمَ خَٰلِدِينَ فِيهَاۚ هِيَ حَسۡبُهُمۡۚ وَلَعَنَهُمُ ٱللَّهُۖ وَلَهُمۡ عَذَابٞ مُّقِيمٞ
footnotes: Mwenyezi Mungu amewaandikia wanaafiki na makafiri Moto wa Jahannamu. Atawaadhibu humo, wala hawatatoka. Hayo yanatosha kuwa ni malipo yao, na pamoja na malipo hayo watapata kukasirikiwa na Mwenyezi Mungu na adhabu ya daima Siku ya Kiyama.

version.title: Swahili translation - Ali Muhsen Alberwany
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Swahili by Ali Muhsen Alberwany

meta.transliteration: waʿada al-lahu al-munāfiqīna wal-munāfiqāti wal-kufāra nāra jahannama khālidīna fīhā hiya ḥasbuhum walaʿanahumu al-lahu walahum ʿadhābun muqīmun
